Package net.minestom.server.event.player

@NotNullByDefault package net.minestom.server.event.player
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    net.minestom.server.event
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdvancementTabEvent
    Called when a Player opens the advancement screens or switch the tab and when he closes the screen.
    AsyncPlayerConfigurationEvent
    Called when a player enters the configuration state (either on first connection, or if they are sent back to configuration later).
    AsyncPlayerPreLoginEvent
    Called before the player initialization, it can be used to kick the player before any connection or to change his final username/uuid.
    PlayerAnvilInputEvent
    Called every time a Player types a letter in an anvil GUI.
    PlayerBlockBreakEvent
     
    PlayerBlockInteractEvent
    Called when a player interacts with a block (right-click).
    PlayerBlockPlaceEvent
    Called when a player tries placing a block.
    PlayerCancelDiggingEvent
    Called when a Player stops digging a block before it is broken
    PlayerChangeHeldSlotEvent
    Called when a player change his held slot (by pressing 1-9 keys).
    PlayerChatEvent
    Called every time a Player writes and sends something in the chat.
    PlayerChunkLoadEvent
    Called when a player receive a new chunk data.
    PlayerChunkUnloadEvent
    Called after a chunk being unload to a certain player.
    PlayerCommandEvent
    Called every time a player send a message starting by '/'.
    PlayerConfigCustomClickEvent
    Triggered when we receive a custom click packet from the client during the configuration state.
    PlayerCustomClickEvent
    Triggered when we receive a custom click packet from the client during the play state.
    PlayerDeathEvent
    Called when a player die in Player.kill().
    PlayerDebugSubscriptionsRequestEvent
    An event wrapper for ClientDebugSubscriptionRequestPacket which is called when any DebugSubscription is requested/removed/updated by the client with all subscriptions in its entirety, with entries missing if unregistering from last event,
    For example by commonly pressing F3-2 for DebugSubscriptions.DEDICATED_SERVER_TICK_TIME will be a set containing DebugSubscriptions.DEDICATED_SERVER_TICK_TIME and requesting a DebugSubscriptions.BEES will be an event where subscriptions contains both subscriptions.
    PlayerDisconnectEvent
    Called when a player disconnect.
    PlayerEditSignEvent
     
    PlayerEntityInteractEvent
    Called when a Player interacts (right-click) with an Entity.
    PlayerFinishDiggingEvent
    Called when a Player successfully finishes digging a block
    PlayerGameModeChangeEvent
    Called when the gamemode of a player is being modified.
    PlayerGameModeRequestEvent
    Called when a player uses the F3+F4 menu to try and change their gamemode.
    PlayerHandAnimationEvent
    Called when the player swings his hand.
    PlayerLeaveBedEvent
     
    PlayerLoadedEvent
    Called when a player indicates that they have finished loading into the world.
    PlayerMoveEvent
    Called when a player is modifying his position.
    PlayerPacketEvent
     
    PlayerPacketOutEvent
    Listen to outgoing packets asynchronously.
    PlayerPickBlockEvent
    Called when a player tries to pick a block (middle-click).
    PlayerPickEntityEvent
    Called when a player tries to pick an entity (middle-click).
    PlayerPluginMessageEvent
    Called when a player send ClientPluginMessagePacket.
    PlayerPreEatEvent
    Called before the PlayerEatEvent and can be used to change the eating time or to cancel its processing, cancelling the event means that the player will continue the animation indefinitely.
    PlayerResourcePackStatusEvent
    Called when a player warns the server of a resource pack status.
    PlayerRespawnEvent
    Called when Player.respawn() is executed (for custom respawn or as a result of ClientStatusPacket
    PlayerSettingsChangeEvent
    Called after the player signals the server that his settings has been modified.
    PlayerSkinInitEvent
    Called at the player connection to initialize his skin.
    PlayerSpawnEvent
    Called when a new instance is set for a player.
    PlayerSpectateEvent
    Called by the SpectateListener when a player starts spectating an entity.
    PlayerStartDiggingEvent
    Called when a Player start digging a block, can be used to forbid the Player from mining it.
    PlayerStartFlyingEvent
    Called when a player start flying.
    PlayerStartFlyingWithElytraEvent
     
    PlayerStartSneakingEvent
    Called when a player starts sneaking.
    PlayerStartSprintingEvent
    Called when a player starts sprinting.
    PlayerStopFlyingEvent
    Called when a player stop flying.
    PlayerStopFlyingWithElytraEvent
     
    PlayerStopSneakingEvent
    Called when a player stops sneaking.
    PlayerStopSprintingEvent
    Called when a player stops sprinting.
    PlayerSwapItemEvent
    Called when a player is trying to swap his main and off hand item.
    PlayerTickEndEvent
     
    PlayerTickEvent
    Called at each player tick.
    PlayerUseItemEvent
    Event when an item is used without clicking on a block.
    PlayerUseItemOnBlockEvent
    Used when a player is clicking on a block with an item (but is not a block in item form).
